file.name: token.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.3"
info:
  title: ReportStream Token API
  version: "1.0"
  contact:
    name: USDS at Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
    url: https://open.cdc.gov
    email: usds@cdc.gov
paths:
  /api/token:
    post:
      description: generate a new token for the requested scope
      security:
        - OAuth2: [ user ]
      parameters:
        - name: client_assertion
          in: path
          description: signed JWT for the sender
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: verylong.signed.jwtstring
        - name: scope
          in: path
          description: permissions for the auth token
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: org.sender.endpoint
            example: strac.default.reports
      requestBody:
        description: empty body needed on post calls
        content:
          application/json: {}
      responses:
        '200':
          description: the token was created and returned
          # content:
          #   application/json:
          #     schema:
          #       $ref: '#/components/schemas/TableVersionInfo'
        '400':
          description: bad request
        '401':
          description: unauthorized

components:
  securitySchemes:
    OAuth2:
      $ref: 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CDCgov/prime-reportstream/master/prime-router/docs/api/components/security_schemes.yml#/OAuth2'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /api/token: post: security: parse security scheme "OAuth2": : unknown security scheme type ""
